they agreed and they all so they seemed happy enough anyway and they liked they liked having you they said

the opposite of what the experience I had here

and then so I sent them that

cos it's not at all their style to sort of say that they like things when they don't
we really like doing the workshops

erm one guy said I don't usually like English but as you let you let us a lot of you let us have a lot of freedom and erm I was happy to you know I thought I thought that's what they needed to not to be sort of mithered too much they been wanted a lot of freedom
it wouldn't work with them would it?
and I got really nice and the last after you left we went to the to the pub with some of them and I gave them all my second hand books that I don't want anymore and they were really touched by that
and they said I'm reading er I'm reading some of the books you gave us and
novels yeah and the feedback didn't at all correspond to what this woman had said

no cos she doesn't read English she doesn't speak English she's always going on about how shshe doesn't speak a word of English
well I reckon it would be worth translating that feedback cos it's so such a contrast isn't it? I
thought so it made me feel pretty low alalready just having a low
end of term and then I got this criticism and I was thinking oh no and then I got the feedback from those students which was really nice which really cheered me up

yeah but it makes you wonder where did she where is she coming from? where does she get this idea from? it must have been one student on one morning or maybe she said what don't you like about er 's course?
and also it was interesting you know when you give feedback you usually say one well the the sort of practice is to say one nice thing and then
and she didn't say she went straight into you know negative negative negative as if the whole thing had been a disa and I was thinking well that's not the impression that I got at all

and so if you can manage that which you have which you did

you go well there's nothing interesting about that price
but in French it really means
there's a value it's it's valuable
